Short history

about global care.

Global Care was established in 2018. We started as a specialized commercial cleaning and maintenance service company. We have successfully implemented varied cleaning applications for a diverse range of situations. When a client comes to select a specialized facilities service company for their property, Global Care has the experience, resources and dedication. Our services are tailored to meet the specialized needs of any facility by offering a wide variety of services, utilizing the most effective and up to date products, procedures and equipment. Currently, we offer building maintenance, pest control, landscaping / plant care, labour outsourcing with the same focus on customer care, and professionalism.
